review: I had consulted Docter Sabyasachi Paul at B. M. Birla Cardiac Research Centre for my Father's heart problem. He advised us to implant pacemaker due to some conduction issue and describe us very clearly why it's obvious for us. He is very energetic and positive minded docter . My father is now recovering day by day after operation done by him and he had also appreciated this docter for his post operative care. We are very much satisfied and benefited by the service provided by B. M. Birla Cardiac Research Centre and Dr. Sabyasachi Paul. We wish him good luck. üôè

I visited him for my mother's heart failure treatment. He is an amazing doctor and a doctor whom I consider an angel sent by God for my mother.He listens to your problems very patiently & is very down to earth.I would definitely recommend him for any heart related problems specially heart failure.The only negative thing I would mention is the waiting time required is sometimes more as he attends the OPD patients & IPD patients at the same time which is often more time consuming for patients as they need to wait.*** ******** ** *** ** ** **** ************* * **** ****** *********** *********** ********* ** *** ******** * always encourages to do lifestyle modifications along with the medications which is of utmost importance for being healthy.May God bless you doctor.

Have visited the Dr. for some of Heart issues *** ***** *** ** ** *** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** *** *** **** * ******** **** **., he listens and give time and explains everything in detail and doesn't demotivate with any negative aspects of your problems***** ** *** ** *** **** *** *** ***** **** ** ********* *** *** **** * *** **

I have taken appointment for cardiology concern for my family members and We have visited The Calcutta Medical Research Institute, when we have visited the hospital we had guided for BM Birla Heart Research Centre with same doctor only. So we have revisited for this hospital again. Doctor was quite good and he had done the check up, after the check up treatment was given according to it. With his treatment we are 85% satisfied. There was long wait time for us in hospital and we had waited almost 2 hours for our appointment. ** ******** ***** **** ******* **** ******** ****** ***** *** *** ********* Apart from that all this was good only. If any required consultation for cardiology means I would like to recommend this doctor.

I have visited the hospital last month with my  father in law and it was related to his health. Consultation was very good  by the doctor. I can definitely recommend the doctor to my family or friends. Medicine was prescribed by doctor during consultation .  There was no waiting time in the hospital . Doctor was friendly. i can rate him 5 out of 5.
I have consulted Dr Sabyasachi Paul at B.M. Birla Heart Research Center and received right treatment at right time.
